A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Approaching this movie from a fan's perspective\, it is absolutely awful. The film killed\, both metaphorically and literally\, our childhood hero. Its character arcs either amounted to nothing or were illogical. I could go on for hours\, but I'll leave this at the murder of Luke Skywalker. 

From that of an objective moviegoer\, the numerous plot holes\, conflicts in tone with scene\, poorly-developed character arcs\, inappropriate interactions among characters\, and disastrous gaps in continuity ruined this film. I have absolutely no idea how critics who are actually paid to critique movies can possibly approve of this cinematic trash. 

Sorry\, Mark Hammill. I'm just so sorry.
